I NEVER SAID I had any problem with an ammo limit.  I only have a 
couple of characters that are even capable of firing such a huge 
number of shots in one round, and they CAN and WILL need to reload.

And on another point, name one episode where any G1 Transformer ran 
out of "ammo".  There were only two references to weapons having a 
power supply limit at all (The Revenge of Bruticus and Five Faces of 
Darkness), and both were under very extreme circumstances.

> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > Whee... time to kill two birds with one stone. Dinobot wasn't 
using 
> his 
> > energy weapons during coming of the fuzors instead he was using a 
> hand 
> > blaster and a shotgun laser blaster type thing. Because of this 
he 
> ran out of 
> > ammo. Also the weapons couldnt be solar charged because then they 
> would have 
> > to be outraegeously used to charge and power the weapon. And if 
> there were 
> > solar cells then there would have been power to power the weapons 
> at night 
> > since what kind of idiot wouldn't have solar batteries that took 
in 
> some of 
> > the energy to operate the weapon at night. This still doesn't 
> explain why 
> > they faught at night either. Face it they needed ammo and they 
did

one
